Package org.glite.authz.common.model

This model serves as a simplified XACML model and is used as the Hessian object model used to communicate between the PEP client and daemon.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
Action An attribute-based description of an action to be authorized.
Attribute An attribute that identifies either a Subject, Resource, Environment or Action.
AttributeAssignment A requirement that a particular attribute have a given set of values within the PEP.
Environment An attribute-based description of the environment in which an Action is to be performed.
Obligation Description of an obligation that must be performed by the PEP.
Request An authorization request.
Resource An attribute-based description of the resource within which an Action to be authorized is made.
Response Response for an authorization Request.
Result Result of an authorization request.
Status Status of an authorization request.
StatusCode The code for a Status.
Subject Attribute-based description of the subject of an authorization request.
 

Package org.glite.authz.common.model Description

This model serves as a simplified XACML model and is used as the Hessian object model used to communicate between the PEP client and daemon.
